title: Lesson 034: My Daily Phrase German
description: Learn German step by step, day by day, phrase by phrase. In today's show you'll learn to ask what there is in the town or village you're visiting. Spend 5 minutes with us and gain confidence in speaking German with our 20-week course. You can automatically download each new episode for free by subscribing in iTunes. Please visit our website for more information.
